description.en:
Ziktalk is a language sharing platform that are in live operation. There are more than 1600 registered tutors and 100,000 learners worldwide. You can actually find a real foreigner you can talk to in Ziktalk.

Ziktalk is developing to be a global gig-sharing platform where you can find an expert in any area (eg: law, marketing, business, etc) whom you can actually talk to. We created ZIK Token for the platform and its international users. Gig-sellers and users can make payment with confidence and ease, all by the decentralized nature of Blockchain.
